title: Community Care Economy Participation During Temporary Vulnerability
description: As a person experiencing temporary vulnerability I want to participate in community care economy as both recipient and contributor So that I receive dignified support while maintaining agency and building toward stability
content:
Feature: Community Care Economy Participation During Temporary Vulnerability
  As a person experiencing temporary vulnerability
  I want to participate in community care economy as both recipient and contributor
  So that I receive dignified support while maintaining agency and building toward stability

  Background:
    Given I am navigating temporary vulnerability
    And I am participating in the community care economy
    And I am using the community_elohim to coordinate care relationships
    And my care contributions are tracked with care tokens

  Scenario: Receiving community support framed as reciprocal care, not charity
    Given I need substantial support with resources, childcare, and crisis navigation
    And I worry about being seen as "taker" or burden
    When I access community support through care economy network
    Then the Value Scanner frames support as reciprocal care, not charity
    And recognizes my parenting labor as valuable care contribution
    And validates that everyone needs support during vulnerability
    And connects me to support based on my care economy participation
    And ensures support is offered with dignity and respect
    And my personal_agent helps me access help without shame
    And tracks my ongoing care contributions even during crisis
    And validates that receiving support when needed is how care economy works

  Scenario: Contributing to community care economy even while in crisis
    Given I am receiving support and have limited capacity
    And I still have skills, knowledge, and care to offer
    When opportunities arise to contribute to community
    Then the Value Scanner surfaces contribution opportunities matching my capacity
    And recognizes even small contributions as valuable
    And facilitates contributions that don't overwhelm my limited resources
    And tracks my care economy participation comprehensively
    And validates that I am contributor as well as recipient
    And my personal_agent suggests contributions I can manage
    And ensures my contributions are recognized with care tokens
    And supports reciprocity without exploiting vulnerable people

  Scenario: Connecting with peer support from others experiencing similar vulnerability
    Given I need connection with people who understand domestic violence, housing crisis, or similar challenges
    And peer support reduces isolation and provides practical wisdom
    When I seek peer support through community network
    Then the community_elohim connects me to peer support groups
    And identifies others with shared experiences willing to connect
    And facilitates mutual support relationships
    And validates that peer support is different from professional services
    And protects privacy while enabling genuine connection
    And my personal_agent helps me participate in peer community
    And recognizes peer support relationships as care economy contribution
    And celebrates mutual understanding and solidarity

  Scenario: Participating in community mutual aid networks
    Given community has mutual aid networks for resources, skills, childcare, support
    And mutual aid operates on reciprocity and solidarity
    When I engage with community mutual aid
    Then the Value Scanner connects me to local mutual aid networks
    And facilitates both my receiving and my contributing
    And tracks mutual aid participation with care tokens
    And helps me navigate mutual aid culture and expectations
    And validates that mutual aid is community care, not individual charity
    And my personal_agent coordinates my mutual aid relationships
    And recognizes mutual aid as alternative to degrading institutional charity
    And supports genuine reciprocity and collective care

  Scenario: Building community care relationships that will endure beyond crisis
    Given I am building relationships during crisis period
    And some relationships could become long-term community connections
    When I invest in community relationships
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify relationships with potential for depth
    And supports genuine connection beyond transactional support
    And facilitates relationship development over time
    And tracks meaningful community relationships
    And validates that vulnerable people build valuable friendships
    And my personal_agent nurtures relationships that provide belonging
    And recognizes community-building as important social infrastructure
    And celebrates friendships that survive crisis transition

  Scenario: Accessing community resources without invasive means-testing
    Given traditional social services require proving I'm "needy enough"
    And care economy provides support based on different principles
    When I access community resources through care economy
    Then the Value Scanner provides access based on care participation, not means-testing
    And doesn't require exposing private trauma to gatekeepers
    And validates my care contributions as basis for receiving support
    And preserves my privacy and dignity
    And connects me to resources efficiently without bureaucratic barriers
    And my personal_agent helps me navigate with minimal burden
    And recognizes that care economy support differs from institutional charity
    And provides dignified alternative to degrading social services

  Scenario: Participating in community decision-making about care economy governance
    Given community care economy has governance decisions to make
    And I am community member with stake in how care economy operates
    When community discusses care economy policies or practices
    Then the community_elohim enables my participation in governance
    And validates my voice as community member regardless of crisis status
    And helps me contribute to governance discussions within my capacity
    And ensures vulnerable people's perspectives shape care economy
    And my personal_agent surfaces governance opportunities
    And recognizes governance participation as valuable civic contribution
    And supports inclusive community decision-making
    And celebrates community ownership of care economy

  Scenario: Offering specialized knowledge or skills to community despite crisis circumstances
    Given I have professional skills, knowledge, or experience that could help others
    And crisis circumstances don't erase my capabilities
    When community members could benefit from my expertise
    Then the Value Scanner surfaces opportunities to share my knowledge
    And facilitates skill-sharing and mentorship relationships
    And recognizes my expertise contributions with care tokens
    And validates that crisis doesn't eliminate my competence
    And helps me contribute in ways that match my current capacity
    And my personal_agent identifies good matches for my skills
    And tracks my knowledge contributions to community
    And celebrates that I am valuable community resource

  Scenario: Receiving community support during acute crisis escalation
    Given I am experiencing crisis escalation (domestic violence, housing loss, severe resource depletion)
    And I need rapid community response
    When acute crisis requires immediate support
    Then the community_elohim coordinates rapid community response
    And connects me to community members who can provide immediate help
    And organizes material support, emergency housing, safety assistance
    And provides crisis support with dignity and urgency
    And validates that crisis escalation requires collective response
    And my personal_agent alerts community to my urgent needs appropriately
    And recognizes that care economy enables rapid crisis response
    And ensures community mobilizes to support member in danger

  Scenario: Contributing my lived experience to community knowledge and advocacy
    Given my experience navigating domestic violence, housing crisis, or social services provides valuable insight
    And community advocacy could benefit from my perspective
    When opportunities arise to contribute to advocacy or community knowledge
    Then the Value Scanner facilitates my participation in advocacy
    And values my experiential knowledge as expertise
    And helps me contribute to policy advocacy or community education
    And protects my privacy while amplifying my voice
    And recognizes advocacy participation as valuable community contribution
    And my personal_agent identifies advocacy opportunities matching my capacity
    And tracks my advocacy contributions with care economy credit
    And celebrates that vulnerable people's knowledge shapes community

  Scenario: Navigating community relationships with people at different vulnerability levels
    Given community includes people in various circumstances (crisis, stability, privilege)
    And relationships cross different resource and vulnerability levels
    When I interact with community members from different positions
    Then the community_elohim facilitates cross-difference relationships
    And validates that I am peer regardless of current circumstances
    And helps me navigate power dynamics in community relationships
    And prevents exploitation while enabling genuine connection
    And recognizes that care economy includes people in various situations
    And my personal_agent supports me in authentic relationships across difference
    And tracks care economy participation beyond simplistic "giver/receiver" binary
    And celebrates diverse community including vulnerable and privileged members

  Scenario: Building community care economy capital that will serve me beyond crisis
    Given my care contributions during crisis are tracked and recognized
    And care economy capital could support me after crisis resolves
    When I accumulate care tokens through ongoing care contributions
    Then the Value Scanner tracks my comprehensive care economy participation
    And recognizes parenting, peer support, mutual aid, knowledge sharing, and other contributions
    And builds care economy standing that will endure beyond temporary vulnerability
    And validates that my crisis period contributions are valuable
    And creates basis for future community support if needed
    And my personal_agent helps me understand my care economy capital
    And documents that vulnerability doesn't erase contribution
    And ensures my care work is recognized long-term

  Scenario: Transitioning from primarily receiving to balanced care economy participation
    Given I am moving from acute crisis toward greater stability
    And my capacity to contribute is increasing
    When I rebuild capability to contribute more to community
    Then the Value Scanner supports my transition to greater contribution
    And celebrates increasing capacity without pressuring premature independence
    And helps me find meaningful ways to contribute as I'm able
    And validates that recovery enables greater community participation
    And tracks my evolving care economy participation over time
    And my personal_agent identifies contribution opportunities matching increasing capacity
    And recognizes that care economy support enabled my rebuilding
    And supports gradual shift toward balanced reciprocity
